channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 7, 08:30 - 08:45 UTC

Aug 21, 20:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, change is scheduled on our API.
âš  API change
The 7th of October 2025, the following API calls will be definitely removed:
- All API calls under /me/installationTemplate
- POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/install/start.
Customers can migrate to its successor POST /dedicated/server/{serviceName}/reinstall.

Start time: 07/10/2025 08:30 UTC
End time: 07/10/2025 08:45 UTC
Service impact: None
More details about the change: End of life for personal installation templates.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SGP][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple Racks maintenance Notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 24, 12:00 - 18:00 UTC

Aug 26, 15:27 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare metal offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 24/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 24/09/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in racks 040722B, 040820A, 040821B, 040821A will be unreachable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from the specified racks.
A specific communication will be sent to the impacted customer.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS/GRA][Managed Services] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 18, 19:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX/LIM][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 4, 04:30 - 21:00 UTC

Aug 26, 16:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Bare Metal Cloud offer.

Start time : 04/09/2025 04:30 UTC
End time : 04/09/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will perform an update on the storage servers hosting your data.
This version will improve certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.
During the maintenance period, your data will remain available.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Rack GRA0326A06A incident notification
item.description:
Aug 31, 13:59 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : All servers in rack GRA0326A06A were temporarily unavailable between 13:34 and 13:52 UTC.
Now, most of the affected servers are operational again.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 31, 09:42 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Since 09:12 UTC, most of the affected servers have been operational again.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified, and our teams are working to restore the remaining servers as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 31, 09:38 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on rack GRA0326A06A in GRA3.
Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 31/08/2025 08:49 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All servers in the rack GRA0326A06A are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are currently unable to access or use the servers located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Bare Metal Cloud] - End of Installation date change for Proxmox Virtual Environment (VE) 8 and Proxmox Backup Server (BS) 3
item.description:
Aug 26, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 26, 15:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we are changing the scheduled End of Installation date for Proxmox VE 8 and Proxmox BS 3 at OVHcloud.

These OSes were previously scheduled to be available for installation until July 2028. This date has now been changed to August 2026 in accordance with the publisher's official support policy for Proxmox Virtual Environment and Proxmox Backup Server.

Please note that this change will only affect future OS installations. Customers who have already installed one of these OSes are not affected by this change.


Start time: 26/08/2025 16:00 UTC
End time: 02/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact: None

Thank you for your understanding.
